name: Mythic Victory Arena
description: ★ Welcome to Mythic Victory Arena! ★ Select a character and face off in the arena. Climb your way through the ranks to become the champion and achieve your greatest desire. The arena is here for you to show off your best ability. What are you waiting for?
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR Storage: 800 MB available space
